thread.title_full: The Children’s Place: Kids’ 3-in-1 Jackets Only $15 In Store Only (Regularly $69.95)

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: The Children’s Place: Kids’ 3-in-1 Jackets Only $15 In Store Only (Regularly $69.95)
text:
For a limited time, head on into your local The Children’s Place store where they are hosting a Monster Sale and offering up 60%-75% all clearance prices with almost no exclusions (except for shoes and accessories). As you can see from the pictures in this post, one reader spotted some hot buys on 3-in-1 Jackets at her local store.
From reader, Kathy – Hi Collin! Last night, I purchased one of the girls 3-in-1 Winter Jackets that come with a removable fleece liner for ONLY $15 – down from $69.95! They were part of the 75% off winter gear clearance event that is going on now! 

Prefer to shop online? Get Free Shipping and 50% Off Sitewide making Tees only $2.85 shipped ! (Thanks, Kathy!)
